resources.string: Registration number copied to the buffer!

\u0020The application is designed to check for the presence of excess of the established speed detected by automatic means of photo and video shooting on a vehicle registered in the Republic of Belarus. \n We draw attention to the fact that information about the presence of a fact of exceeding the speed of traffic becomes available not from the moment of fixation of the speed of movement, but from the date of issuing a resolution on imposing an administrative penalty against the owner (owner). The period of imposing an administrative penalty is two months from the day of the commission of the offense.

Initially, it is necessary to add one or more vehicles by entering data from the vehicle data sheet. Please note: the letters must be fully consistent with those recorded in the data sheet! 
 If you set the auto-check flag, the check will be performed automatically several times a day, even if the application is not running. If a fine is found, a notification will be generated, by clicking on which you can go to the application, where the new fines found are highlighted in color. 
 To manually check penalties at once for all auto-vehicles, click the button on the top right or swipe down the list of vehicles. 
 To remove a car - swipe to it to the left, to edit - to the right. Clicking on the car will display all previously found fines. Here you can check fines for this car only. 
 You can remove the penalty from the application by dragging it to the left. Options for paying a fine are available after clicking on the icon to the right of the selected penalty.
Write to the developer by e-mail
